A frontend application that fetches all species biological data from backend APIs
A backend API service that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Database schema design to store species biological information data
Browse functionality to display lists of species with their biological information
Search functionality allowing users to find specific species or biological data
Filtering capabilities to narrow down species data based on various criteria
Responsive web design with linen as the base color and maroon for all UI components
Species detail pages displaying comprehensive biological information
Pagination or infinite scroll for browsing large datasets
API endpoints for retrieving species data with support for search and filter parameters
User interface components for search input and filter controls
Data management capabilities for adding and updating species information
Package.json configuration with 'install:all' script for installing frontend and backend dependencies
Package.json configuration with 'dev' script for running frontend and backend concurrently
Error handling for database connections and API requests
